ygData.subject: Crazy or Not?
ygData.msgSnippet: People hooking up through EQ... I knew one woman that I used to talk to about 2 years ago. I was just happy that there were females that played EQ... ROFL!
ygData.messageBody:
People hooking up through EQ...

I knew one woman that I used to talk to about 2 years ago. I was just
happy that there were females that played EQ... ROFL! Anyways she met
a guy in another country after her divorce. He came out to visit with
her. He was there for about a month. They played EQ, she went to
work, and they started a romance. She ended up pregnant. She moved to
his country, than back to the USA, had the child. They no longer play
EQ but have a family here now.

I knew another women who found a husband through EQ. They happen to
live close to each other, hooked up, married, and no longer play EQ.

I recently heard from a male friend that came back to EQ after a year
off. He was looking for cheap entertainment for him and his wife so
they went back to EQ. She's now divorcing him for another man she met
through EQ.

Do any of you have any stories? I heard on a message board once from
one guy about how his GF left him because he was addicted to EQ.
Gross story though.



._.~*~._.~*~.Beverly R._.~*~._.~*~.
